Title: I'M STILL HERE
Summary: Brazil, 1971: a country in the tightening grip of a military dictatorship. A mother is forced to reinvent herself when her family’s life is shattered by an act of arbitrary violence. Based on Marcelo Rubens Paiva's best-selling memoir.
Writers: Murilo Hauser, Heitor Lorega, Marcelo Rubens Paiva
